department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: horizontal stripes and stepped rows of various widths and colors--olive green, orange, tan, purple, blues, brown; blue triangle at one corner with stepped triangle in various shades of yellow; twisted dark blue tassels in two corners--two-strand yarn tassels in opposite two corners; weft-face tapestry weave, continuous warp
medium: Hand dyed and natural Churro wool
title: Indigo Scape
